programme.title: The Great Debaters
programme.desc: In 1935, students at historically black Wiley College form a debate team, and go on to defeat Harvard.

programme.title: Z for Zachariah
programme.desc: Margot Robbie, Chris Pine, and Chiwetel Ejiofor star in this thought-provoking post-apocalyptic story.

programme.title: Needle in a Timestack
programme.desc: A devoted husband will stop at nothing to save his marriage, after it gets destroyed by a time traveling rival

programme.title: I Still See You
programme.desc: Set ten years after an apocalyptic event that killed millions and left the world inhabited by ghosts.

programme.title: I Think We're Alone Now
programme.desc: The apocalypse proves a blessing in disguise for one lucky recluse -- until a second survivor arrives.

programme.title: The Road
programme.desc: After an apocalyptic event, a father and son struggle to survive on a quest to reach the ocean.

programme.title: Snowpiercer
programme.desc: After a failed global-warming experiment, a post-apocalyptic Ice Age has killed off nearly all life on Earth.
